data.name: NarratorIntro
data.value: A suspicious-looking artifact hunter walks into a bar...

data.name: NarratorPunchline
data.value: Do you want to hear the punchline?

data.name: InnKeeperGreet
data.value: Hey lad! Need some help?

data.name: InnKeeperTrailer
data.value: The dungeon is right there lad, under the trapdoor...

data.name: OldGuy
data.value: Interested in some history, boy?

data.name: OldGuyStoryPlayEnter
data.value: Let me tell you an old story then...

data.name: OldGuyStoryPlayLeaving
data.value: Son, where do you think that trapdoor leads?!

data.name: PlayerStoryPlayCancel
data.value: Old man, I've changed my mind...

data.name: PlayerStoryPlayLeaving
data.value: Old man, tell me something I don't know!

data.name: Story1_1
data.value: It is said, that a great evil
data.comment: The first "story" speech text is put together from text parts: Story1_1, Story1_2 and Story1_3

data.name: Story1_2
data.value: , a Buzzard Wizard
data.comment: The first "story" speech text is put together from text parts: Story1_1, Story1_2 and Story1_3

data.name: Story1_3
data.value: , is to blame for the disappearance of magic.
data.comment: The first "story" speech text is put together from text parts: Story1_1, Story1_2 and Story1_3

data.name: Story2_1
data.value: Rumor has it
data.comment: The second "story" speech text is put together from text parts: Story2_1, Story2_2 and Story2_3

data.name: Story2_2
data.value: , that this powerful demon is still alive
data.comment: The second "story" speech text is put together from text parts: Story2_1, Story2_2 and Story2_3

data.name: Story2_3
data.value: and its dungeon is full of supernatural artifacts.
data.comment: The second "story" speech text is put together from text parts: Story2_1, Story2_2 and Story2_3

data.name: DrunkGuy
data.value: Want to hear something weird? This is all fake, we live in an illusion...

data.name: Trophies
data.value: Those are trophies earned by heroes who visited our inn. Please do not touch!

data.name: Stash
data.value: You can take one item from the stash with you into the dungeon.

data.name: StashEmpty
data.value: There is nothing in the stash for you. Please do not touch!

data.name: HallOfFame
data.value: Notes on heroes visiting our inn. Didn't know, that this place is so trendy...

data.name: BookShelf1
data.value: Settings What does that mean?

data.name: BookShelf2
data.value: Tome of Artifacts Sounds intriguing!

data.name: BookShelf3
data.value: Book of Monsters Let see those horrors!

data.name: StatueAfraid
data.value: Nice goat skull statue, he-he.

data.name: StatueInstructions
data.value: It has something written on it: Unleash nightmares!

data.name: CandleAfraid
data.value: Scary candle. Too bad, I don't have spark rocks on me...

data.name: CandleWarning
data.value: Think twice before lighting that candle! Only fools seek their own destruction.

data.name: TreasuryOffLimits
data.value: The treasury is off-limits, you have to earn the right to enter...

data.name: PlayerInnExit
data.value: Do I really want to quit? Maybe the next dungeon will be the lucky one!

data.name: PlayerEnterDungeon
data.value: They closed the trapdoor. I think I'll have to find another way out...

data.name: PlayerFirstStairs
data.value: The stairs collapsed under me, they must be ancient. Better watch my step!

data.name: PlayerSewers
data.value: Why did nobody warn me about this smell?!

data.name: PlayerBarracks
data.value: I get the feeling that somebody's following me.

data.name: PlayerVault
data.value: Knock, knock on the vault door. I wonder what goodies are there.

data.name: PlayerCellar
data.value: Any booze?!

data.name: PlayerCatacombs
data.value: Sickening chamber. Its inhabitants are rotten to the core.

data.name: PlayerMausoleum
data.value: I've been roaming for a while now... I must be getting close, aren't I?!

data.name: PlayerTomb
data.value: Hush, don't wake the dead...

data.name: PlayerFort
data.value: This place gives me the KREEPS!

data.name: PlayerCavern
data.value: Looks like reality itself is distorted! Can't tell which way is up or down...

data.name: PlayerAbyss1
data.value: Well, you are indeed alive Buzzard Wizard?!

data.name: PlayerAbyss2
data.value: Hand over your artifacts or I rip out your gizzard!!!

data.name: PlayerPoisonedForTheFirstTime
data.value: My mouth tastes like rotten penguin meat. I'm poisoned...

data.name: PlayerHallucinatingForTheFirstTime
data.value: My eyes are dazzling?! That must have been a hallucination...

data.name: PlayerFirstItemPickedUp
data.value: I should put that to good use in my inventory...

data.name: PlayerShinyArtifacts
data.value: Now that is one shiny artifact! Mesmerizing. Hypnotizing. It's; calling me...

data.name: PlayerGoldenFeatherPickup
data.value: I feel really really weird... What is happening to me?!

data.name: PlayerRightChoice
data.value: I gotta get out of here, now!

data.name: KnightRightChoice
data.value: Need a hand in getting out of this wretched place?

data.name: SameItem1
data.value: I already have one like that equipped!

data.name: SameItem2
data.value: I don't really need two of those...

data.name: SameItem3
data.value: What should I do with a second one?!

data.name: Shop
data.value: Welcome to the Black Raven Market!

data.name: ShopFirst
data.value: Choose wisely! You can only buy one, I'll take back the rest...

data.name: ShopWhatever
data.value: Choose whatever you want, just don't hurt me...

data.name: ShopAngry1
data.value: Stop pushing me around!

data.name: ShopAngry2
data.value: What are you trying to achieve?!

data.name: ShopAngry3
data.value: My answer is; 42 (forty-two)...

data.name: ShopAngry4
data.value: No take-backsies in my shop!

data.name: Death1
data.value: That must have hurt.

data.name: Death2
data.value: Oh, poor Joey... Maybe next time!

data.name: Death3
data.value: No one will ever bury that corpse...

data.name: Death4
data.value: You have been slaughtered!

data.name: Death5
data.value: All those lovely artifacts, lost forever in the dungeon.

data.name: Death6
data.value: Who is going to wipe out the Buzzard Wizard then?

data.name: Death7
data.value: Avenge your old self in the next run!

data.name: Death8
data.value: One more try?

data.name: Death9
data.value: That's it, you are dead.
